projects.name: DoDo
projects.description: DoDo is a ToDo website where users can create an account and enter their ToDos. This project was my first practical application of React.js.

usedTechnologies.name: React
usedTechnologies.description: Using React for the front-end of my website allowed me to efficiently structure my code and develop with greater speed.

usedTechnologies.name: Node.js
usedTechnologies.description: The combination of Node.js and Express.js enabled me to seamlessly transfer data from the front-end to the back-end.

usedTechnologies.name: MySql
usedTechnologies.description: By utilizing MySql as the database to store user data and task information, it greatly assisted me in the development of a todo platform.

usedTechnologies.name: Heroku
usedTechnologies.description: Heroku was instrumental in hosting both the node.js app and backend application for me..

projects.emergence: I have recently begun learning React, and I decided to create my own ToDo platform to aid my learning process. Although building a ToDo platform is a common project for new React programmers, I challenged myself by incorporating User Management functionality into it
projects.result: A ToDo Website run on Heruko but currently inactive

projects.name: BudgetBooster
projects.description: BudgetBooster is a game I developed using Next.js, is hosted on our own server. It teaches teenagers about wise financial decisions through a fun and engaging gameplay.

usedTechnologies.name: Next.js
usedTechnologies.description: Next.js proved to be the perfect solution for enabling efficient communication between the front-end and back-end during the development of my app, allowing me to work with greater speed and productivity.

usedTechnologies.name: Chart.js
usedTechnologies.description: Chart Js helped me to visualize the Data i got from my Players.It was easy to leran and use.

usedTechnologies.name: MySql
usedTechnologies.description: For storing the stats of my players, I relied on MySql as my preferred database solution, which proved to be a reliable and efficient choice.

projects.emergence: A teacher at my school introduced me to the Kardea Price project, which focuses on teenagers and money management. This sparked an idea for a game where the user can practice managing their spending habits.
projects.result: A Website where Player can play the Game and Learn about Money

projects.name: Furt
projects.description: Furt ist a Mobiel Game about Colors. The Player has to Shoot the color in the right area and avoid obstacels. The Game is made with Unity and runs on Android

usedTechnologies.name: Unity
usedTechnologies.description: Unity is my preferred game engine for programming games, thanks to its built-in mobile support that made it a perfect fit for creating my mobile game.

usedTechnologies.name: Photoshop
usedTechnologies.description: With Photoshop, I was able to create all of the necessary assets for my games.

projects.emergence: I had some free time and decided to create a mobile game. While I had prior knowledge of Unity, I had never developed a mobile game before. Since I wanted to create a game based on colors, I began programming.
projects.result: A Mobie Game Called FURT for Android
